abstract: Hicham Mansouri, investigative journalist writing piece on electronic surveillance in Morocco, is found guilty by Moroccan court of adultery and starting a brothel and receives 10-month sentence and $4,340 fine.
lead_paragraph: A Moroccan court has convicted an investigative journalist of adultery and starting a brothel, sentencing him to 10 months in jail.

headline.main: Morocco: Journalist Gets Prison Term in Adultery Case
headline.print_headline: Africa; Morocco: Journalist Gets Prison Term in Adultery Case

snippet: A Moroccan court has convicted an investigative journalist of adultery and starting a brothel, sentencing him to 10 months in jail.
